name: NSRectAlignment
desc: Constants that specify alignment to an edge or a set of edges depending on the user interface layout direction.

items.name: case topLeading
items.desc: Aligns to the top and leading edges.

items.name: case bottomLeading
items.desc: Aligns to the bottom and leading edges.

items.name: case bottomTrailing
items.desc: Aligns to the bottom and trailing edges.

items.name: case topTrailing
items.desc: Aligns to the top and trailing edges.
